channel.title: Clean + combat
channel.description:
Might run a server for a bit, just for fun.
Sources with decent combat? Mainly going to be just for PKing.

item.title: Clean + combat
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:11, topic:527154”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=645901.msg4345484#msg4345484 date=1375813284]
Any other recommendations?
[/quote]The issue is that you won’t find a “clean” AND “good combat” base.

You could possibly talk with Arham? I think he worked on a project a while back that was pretty empty/that failed where combat was near complete?[/quote]
Don’t needa be so harsh.

OT: But yes, i did have FroyoScape. However, I lost the combat version of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Clean + combat
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:6, topic:527154”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=645901.msg4345099#msg4345099 date=1375751834]

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/303953-pi-cruelalityx-source-release-ll-stable-ll-good-features-ll-lot-more.html

Its pretty stable and its combat is decent.

that is not stable.

RuneSource

Im calling it stable because it says this in the thread:
The server held 50 players at 0.73% and didn’t lag once.
[/quote]

until he mentioned his 4gb VPS, lol.[/quote]
Ikr, i just noticed that xD

Read full topic
